channel.title: Anyone interested in bug abuse?
channel.description: I'm looking for someone trustworthy and who I won't have to teach EVERYTHING about it too, I've been glitching for a while so I know most of what to look for and where, and I don't mind teaching some things, but I want a partner who is willing to learn AND WORK, not just leach when I find something, someone who will compliment my finds by adding new ideas into the mix.

item.title: Anyone interested in bug abuse?
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

As in bug abuse for GP? I made 6k USD split 2 ways in 2011 abusing an xlog bug, and not a leaked one. By selling the GP I made it was a high complexity bug, that required at a minimum of 3 accounts, I used 12 accounts to speed up the process though and a bot that was specially designed for the bug to make it work better.

Read full topic
